doc.title: Spring
doc.plot: Something has changed. The air is different. Colors are dazzling, and everything is infused with the freshness of nature. It's Spring, as we travel with gardening legend David Tarrant. He chases the season of rebirth around the world, in a 13-week adventure that is part global exploration, part horticultural quest. However, there is always an amazing glimpse of nature at its diverse and glorious finest. From the amazing fields of daisies in South Africa to the brilliant red poppies peeking through the ruins of Greece. David Tarrant explores the planet's most unique plant life and shares the fervent joy that Spring brings, no matter where we live.
